mapper.select: SELECT F.F_ORINAME, F.F_SYSNAME, F.F_CNUM, F.F_THUMB, S.S_NAME FROM IC INNER JOIN F ON F.F_CNUM = IC.IC_CNUM INNER JOIN S ON S.S_NUM = F.F_CNUM WHERE F.F_THUMB = 'THUMB' AND IC.IC_MID = #{m_id} ORDER BY ROWNUM DESC

SELECT COUNT(*) FROM L WHERE L_MID = #{userid}
SELECT * FROM ( SELECT * FROM P FULL OUTER JOIN CON ON P.P_NUM = CON.CON_PNUM WHERE P.P_MID = #{m_id}) ORDER BY P_NUM DESC

SELECT * FROM ( SELECT DISTINCT P.*, CON.*, R.* FROM P FULL OUTER JOIN( SELECT DISTINCT CON.CON_PNUM, CON.CON_ORINAME, CON.CON_SYSNAME FROM CON) CON ON P.P_NUM = CON.CON_PNUM INNER JOIN ( SELECT DISTINCT R_NUM, R_ID, R_PNUM FROM R) R ON P.P_NUM = R.R_PNUM WHERE R.R_ID = #{m_id}) ORDER BY R_NUM DESC

SELECT * FROM (SELECT RES.*, PL.*, S.S_NAME, F.F_SYSNAME FROM RES FULL OUTER JOIN PL ON RES_PLNUM = PL_NUM INNER JOIN S ON PL_CNUM = S_NUM INNER JOIN F ON PL_NUM = F_PLNUM WHERE RES_MID=#{m_id} AND RES_STATUS = 0) ORDER BY RES_NUM DESC

SELECT * FROM (SELECT RES.*, PL.*, S.S_NAME, F.F_SYSNAME FROM RES FULL OUTER JOIN PL ON RES_PLNUM = PL_NUM INNER JOIN S ON PL_CNUM = S_NUM INNER JOIN F ON PL_NUM = F_PLNUM WHERE RES_MID=#{m_id} AND RES_STATUS = 1) ORDER BY RES_NUM DESC
mapper.update: UPDATE RES SET RES_STATUS = 1 WHERE RES_NUM = #{resnum}
mapper.select: SELECT SR_CNUM, SR_DATE,SR_CONTENTS, F_ORINAME, F_SYSNAME, ROUND(AVER, 1) AS ROU FROM ( SELECT SR.*, F.*, AVG(SR_RATE) OVER(PARTITION BY SR_CNUM) AS AVER, ROW_NUMBER() OVER (PARTITION BY SR_CNUM ORDER BY SR_RATE ASC) AS RANG FROM SR INNER JOIN F ON SR_CNUM = F.F_CNUM ORDER BY AVER DESC, SR_DATE DESC) WHERE RANG = 1 AND AVER >= 4 AND ROWNUM <= 3 AND F_THUMB='THUMB'
mapper.update: UPDATE RES SET RES_REVIEW = 1 WHERE RES_NUM = #{num}
